text:
RepoPulse forecast (7-day breakout watchlist)

Method: reproducible baseline model using public GitHub signals (no LLM).
Breakout = +max(200 stars, +50%) within 7 days.

1) HKUDS/nanobot | 97% | stars now 14212 → est 31248 (range 31190-31306)
   https://github.com/HKUDS/nanobot
2) gavrielc/nanoclaw | 95% | stars now 6495 → est 13659 (range 13621-13697)
   https://github.com/gavrielc/nanoclaw
3) mitchellh/vouch | 93% | stars now 1740 → est 6475 (range 6450-6500)
   https://github.com/mitchellh/vouch
4) BlockRunAI/ClawRouter | 93% | stars now 1876 → est 5043 (range 5018-5068)
   https://github.com/BlockRunAI/ClawRouter
5) cloudflare/moltworker | 93% | stars now 8225 → est 14274 (range 14197-14351)
   https://github.com/cloudflare/moltworker

Daily forecasts are logged publicly, then scored 7 days later (hits, misses, calibration).
#opensource #software #datascience #forecasting #github
